thread.title: Harrison Afful set to beat Gyan, Ayew to clinch top SWAG award report
thread.title_full: Harrison Afful set to beat Gyan, Ayew to clinch top SWAG award report

title: Harrison Afful set to beat Gyan, Ayew to clinch top SWAG award report
text:
23:25 CET Harrison Afful set to beat Gyan, Ayew to clinch top SWAG award â€“ report - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Harrison Afful will be named the Footballer of the Year at the 40 th edition of the Sports Writers Association of Ghana (SWAG) awards ceremony on Saturday, according to the General Telegraph. 
The Columbus Crew right-back beat competition from Black Stars team mates Andre Ayew and Asamoah Gyan to clinch the top award which will be unveiled at a ceremony to be held at State Banquet Hall in Accra. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us the dignity of a man and his legitimate aspirations is not known unless his absence is felt. By: Kwesi Dawood
